segments.text: And the cover is great ! The colors are brilliant !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me a break . You don't care about the colors . You just like the hot babe on the cover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , you got me . So , do you have a subscription ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I'm currently the subscriber of 10 different fashion magazines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what do you do with all the out-dated issues ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I'm lending them to you ...
segments.speaker: S2
